net.jawr.web.resource.bundle.locale
Interface LocaleResolver

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultLocaleResolver
public interface LocaleResolver

An adapter to let Jawr access the user's locale based on the current request.

Author:
Jordi Hernández Sellés

Method Summary
 java.lang.String resolveLocaleCode(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
          Resolve the Locale to use for the user associated to a request.
 

Method Detail

resolveLocaleCode

java.lang.String resolveLocaleCode(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
Resolve the Locale to use for the user associated to a request.

Parameters:
request -
Returns:
A string identifying the locale using the standard underscore-separated locale keys (en_US, etc).
